1. Welcome From the Mayor

Welcome From the Mayor
======================

![Ron_Munos_Mayor(jpg)](https://www.graniteshoals.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=679)
Welcome to Granite Shoals, Texas! This is a city that is a welcoming and friendly community. The city is located on the shores of Lake LBJ in Burnet County, Texas, and has a population of approximately 5,000 residents. Granite Shoals is a diverse community with residents from different backgrounds, cultures, and ages.

Granite Shoals is a great place to visit if you are looking for a peaceful and relaxing vacation. The city has many attractions that will keep you entertained throughout your stay. One of the most popular attractions in the city is Lake LBJ. The lake is perfect for swimming, boating, fishing, and other water activities. You can also enjoy hiking and biking on the many trails around the lake.

The city has many parks where you can relax and enjoy nature. One of the most popular parks in the city is Quarry Park. The park has a sports center with soccer, volleyball, basketball, tennis, and pickleball courts that are all covered. It also has picnic areas, playgrounds, walking trails, and a bird-watching area in the park.

In conclusion, Granite Shoals is a welcoming and friendly community with a diverse population. The city has many attractions that will keep you entertained throughout your stay. Whether you are looking for a peaceful vacation or an adventure-filled one, Granite Shoals has something for everyone. Please enjoy your time here for a day or a lifetime.

Ron Munos

Mayor of Granite Shoals
